caliver
  • Reference

Merge netcdf files on the time dimension

This function merges all the netcdf files in a given directory over the time dimension. It saves the merged file in the working directory.

catNetcdf(inDir = NULL, varname = NULL, pattern = NULL,
  recursive = FALSE, outFileName = "outfile.nc", outDir = getwd())

Arguments

inDir

is the directory where all the files to read are stored
varname

name of the variable to extract
pattern

regular expression pattern to select a subset of files
recursive

logical (TRUE by default). If set to TRUE it looks in folders and subfolders
outFileName

output filename
outDir

is the directory where outFileName is saved, by default this is the working directory.

Examples

not_run({
    # Mergetime using single variable nc files
    catNetcdf(inDir = "/var/tmp/moc0/forestfire",
              varname = NULL,
              pattern = "geff_reanalysis_an_fwis_fwi_",
              recursive = TRUE,
              outFileName = "outfile.nc",
              outDir = getwd())

})
